casebody.data:
McALLISTER NAVIGATION COMPANY, Inc., and Daniel F. McAllister, Plaintiffs-Appellants, v. SUTTON LINES, Inc., and John H. Hubbard, A Major in the Quartermaster Corps, United States Army, and Also Known and Designated as Purchasing and Contracting Officer for the United States Army, and United States of America, Defendants-Appellees. No. 280. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. April 4, 1938.

Before L. HAND, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

Lewis Landes, of New York City, for appellants. Lamar Hardy, U. S. Atty., of New York City (Charles J. Nager, of New York City, of counsel), for the U. S., and John R. Hubbard. Chas. J. Katzenstein, of New York City, for Sutton Lines, Inc. PER CURIAM.

Decree affirmed.
